Sentencas: In this study, we fabricated a thickness-controllable double-layer electrolyte to prevent peel-off among the anode, and cathode functional layers, and electrolyte layer generated during the sintering process in the fabrication of solid oxide fuel cell using the roll-to-roll additive manufacturing process.
Titulo: Fabrication of Thickness-Controllable Double Layer Electrolyte Using Roll-to-Roll Additive Manufacturing System

Sentencas: The peel-off could be generated by the difference of coefficient of thermal expansions (CTEs) of the component layers of SOFC.
Titulo: Fabrication of Thickness-Controllable Double Layer Electrolyte Using Roll-to-Roll Additive Manufacturing System

Sentencas: Gadolinium-doped ceria (GDC) is a ceramic electrolyte of which CTE is closer to the mixture of lanthanum strontium cobalt ferrite and gadolinium-doped ceria (LSCF-GDC), the cathode functional layer in this study, than yttrium-Stabilized zirconia (YSZ), the electrolyte layer.
Titulo: Fabrication of Thickness-Controllable Double Layer Electrolyte Using Roll-to-Roll Additive Manufacturing System

Sentencas: By embedding a thin GDC layer between LSCF-GDC and YSZ, the peel-off due to the thermal deformation can be prevented.
Titulo: Fabrication of Thickness-Controllable Double Layer Electrolyte Using Roll-to-Roll Additive Manufacturing System

Sentencas: Using the visco-capillary model, mass conservation law, and wettability of coated solution, we have determined the range of coating conditions for forming a stable coating bead.
Titulo: Fabrication of Thickness-Controllable Double Layer Electrolyte Using Roll-to-Roll Additive Manufacturing System

Sentencas: We coated a high-quality double-layer electrolyte of which component layer thicknesses can be controllable using a pilot-scale roll-to-roll slot-die coating process.
Titulo: Fabrication of Thickness-Controllable Double Layer Electrolyte Using Roll-to-Roll Additive Manufacturing System

Sentencas: The study can be useful to determine the coating conditions in the roll-to-roll process, i.e., coating gap, web speed, and flow rate, for thickness-controllable high-quality multi-layer coating without time and cost consumptive trial-and-error procedure.
Titulo: Fabrication of Thickness-Controllable Double Layer Electrolyte Using Roll-to-Roll Additive Manufacturing System
